description: Prevent unsafe usage of `eval()` in your application since this allows arbitrary code execution.

entries.reason: TODO: Add reason why this violation is allowed to be ignored.
entries.error: Eval-like function usage is potentially dangerous, is often misused, and can cause security issues. Evaluating untrusted code can open an application up to several different injection attacks.
